Text: RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph I have good news I think we are very close to executing this baby I am attahcing comments to the ISDA They reflect comments by our outside cousel which highlight the differences between this contract and the side letterML ISDA They are not much I have also made some changes directly on their draft where I either concurred with Enron or needed to make some of my own changes Pls review and let me know what you think I will be leaving the office soon so if we can wrap it up tomorrow that would be great Im out Monday for Passover Yair Yaish Director and Senior Counsel Allegheny Energy Global Markets LLC Original Message From mailto Sent Friday March PM To Subject ISDA ScheduleParagraph Yair Attached is a blacklined against the Enron North America Corp draft of Schedule and Paragraph to the ISDA Credit Support Annex I have tried to incorporate the essence of the March swap side letter agreement Please call me to discuss as it would be nice to finalize by April Thanks See attached file a Blackline ctr Allegheny Energy Supplydoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Enron North America ISDADOC

RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph any thoughts on my comments ISDA I sent out last week Original Message From Yaish Yair OGC Sent Thursday April PM To Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph Sara I have good news I think we are very close to executing this baby I am attahcing comments to the ISDA They reflect comments by our outside cousel which highlight the differences between this contract and the side letterML ISDA They are not much I have also made some changes directly on their draft where I either concurred with Enron or needed to make some of my own changes Pls review and let me know what you think I will be leaving the office soon so if we can wrap it up tomorrow that would be great Im out Monday for Passover Yair Yaish Director and Senior Counsel Allegheny Energy Global Markets LLC Original Message From mailto Sent Friday March PM To Subject ISDA ScheduleParagraph Yair Attached is a blacklined against the Enron North America Corp draft of Schedule and Paragraph to the ISDA Credit Support Annex I have tried to incorporate the essence of the March swap side letter agreement Please call me to discuss as it would be nice to finalize by April Thanks See attached file a Blackline ctr Allegheny Energy Supplydoc Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax

RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph sorry i didnt get back to you yesterday I was out sick I didnt notice anything attached did u send a subsequent email Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To Cc Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph Importance High Yair Attached is my redline Call me so that we can discuss the remaining issues including Calculation Agent We believe that the existing dispute mechanism is adequate Procedures for Entering into Transactions There is no procedure for dual confirms This is too confusing Transfer We cannot agree to your assignment provision as it is too subjective The other changes were not substantive Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Yaish Yair OGC To xchan cc gemlcom Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph AM Sara any thoughts on my comments ISDA I sent out last week Original Message From Yaish Yair OGC Sent Thursday April PM To Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph Sara I have good news I RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph reviewed the comments were close tosigning I need to speak to our confirms dept and to credit regarding the last two points we may craft some language on the assignment that makes u more comfortable As for calculation agent we can probably live with it ill confirm and get back to you hopefully today In addition I am assuming that you simply accepted the changes and worked from there or do I need to review the entire contract to compare it to the previous version as a lawyer my conscience will probably make do it anyway but just checking Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April PM To Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph Yair Its a good thing you didnt try to get back to me Sorrry See attached file AlleghenyCPformacceptRDOC Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Yaish Yair OGC To xchan cc gemlcom Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph AM Sara sorry i didnt get back to you yesterday I was out sick I didnt notice confirms This is too confusing Transfer We cannot agree to your assignment provision as it is too subjective The other changes were not substantive Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph Allegheny would like to be able to assign to affilaites in the same manner that we are allowing Enron to make an ssignment so long as the Gty goes along In our case however there is no gty hence the stipualtion that such assignment must be to an entity with an equal or better credit rating If you wish I can limit such assignment to an entity rated at least BBB or better Would that resolve your concerns Original Message From mailto Sent Thursday April PM To Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph Yair Its a good thing you didnt try to get back to me Sorrry See attached file FYI FERC FilingI wanted to let u knwo that under the FERC rules we have to file the Enron side letter for the physical master agreement in the same manner that we filed the original agt between Enron and Allegheny Our PA office is handling that and if I am not mistaken has taken of that yesterday I do not think that EPMI is requried to file with the FERC because u are a power amrekter but I am wondering whether u do such filings anyway Original Message From mailto Sent Friday April AM To Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph Yair Ive left a message with Tracy Ngo in Portland and will let you know as soon as I hear from her How long will you be in the office today Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Yaish Yair OGC To xchan cc gemlcom Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph apologize I have been out sick until this afternoon and have not gotten to it I think if memory serves me correctly I think I was generally ok with the language except for the proviso at the end because we do not know what your internal policies are and how you would evaluate the assignee It basically strips out the right because it still leaves us subject to Enrons caprice Could you perhaps give me a better sense as to what the criteria would be Thanks Yair Yaish Director and Senior Counsel Allegheny Energy Global Markets LLC Original Message From mailto Sent Wednesday April PM To Subject RE ISDA ScheduleParagraph Yair Are we finished Please let me know Thanks Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax Yaish Yair OGC RE Transfer provisionam prapring for a trip to Denver tomorrow Can we push this off until next week Yair Yaish Office of General Counsel AEGM Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Cc Subject Transfer provision Yair Tracy and I would like to discuss the Transfer issue with you tomorrow if possible We think this should be a short discussion maybe minutes How is pm NY time tomorrow Wednesday April This seems to be the most convenient for both of us but we will entertain times before pm NY time Would you please email your response Thanks Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax

Comments to Pgph of ISDA Cc my comments to the ISDA Feel free to call me as soon as possible Thanks much Yair Yaish Merrill Lynch OGC Original Message From SMTP Sent Friday March AM To Cc Subject Rerevised Allegheny Side Letter for ISDA SaraJanice thanks for your comments I have reflected them in the attached draft marked to show your changes The governing law provision is a formulation that we have used at SC to accomplish the purpose of giving effect to NYGOL and should achieve the purpose of the language you added to the power master amendment I was planning to conform the latter to the language used here unless you have an objection Allegheny has not yet reviewed this draft so it remains subject to their comment I also need Yair to confirm that he is happy with the new Part Commodity Definitions section Yair this is attached as Exhibit C to the attached document Let me know if you have any further questions or comments Thanks This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately File Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvREDDOC

RE Comments to Pgph of ISDA Cc not sending the attachment here it is AESENRO Side Letter YY Commentsdoc Yair Yaish Merrill Lynch OGC Original Message From Yaish Yair OGC Sent Friday March AM To Cc Subject Comments to Pgph of ISDA Attached are my comments to the ISDA Feel free to call me as soon as possible Thanks much Yair Yaish Merrill Lynch OGC Original Message From SMTP Sent Friday March AM To Cc Subject Rerevised Allegheny Side Letter for ISDA SaraJanice thanks for your comments I have reflected them in the attached draft marked to show your changes The governing law provision is a formulation that we have used at SC to accomplish the purpose of giving effect to NYGOL and should achieve the purpose of the language you added to the power master amendment I was planning to conform the latter to the language used here unless you have an objection Allegheny has not yet reviewed this draft so it remains subject to their comment I also need Yair to confirm that he is happy with the new Part Commodity Definitions section Yair this is attached as Exhibit C to the attached document Let me know if you have any further questions or comments Thanks This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately File Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvREDDOC AESENRO Side Letter YY Commentsdoc

RE Transfer provisionam prapring for a trip to Denver tomorrow Can we push this off until next week Yair Yaish Office of General Counsel AEGM Original Message From mailto Sent Tuesday April PM To Cc Subject Transfer provision Yair Tracy and I would like to discuss the Transfer issue with you tomorrow if possible We think this should be a short discussion maybe minutes How is pm NY time tomorrow Wednesday April This seems to be the most convenient for both of us but we will entertain times before pm NY time Would you please email your response Thanks Sara Shackleton Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB a Houston Texas phone fax

RE Comments to Pgph of ISDA Cc not sending the attachment here it is AESENRO Side Letter YY Commentsdoc Yair Yaish Merrill Lynch OGC Original Message From Yaish Yair OGC Sent Friday March AM To Cc Subject Comments to Pgph of ISDA Attached are my comments to the ISDA Feel free to call me as soon as possible Thanks much Yair Yaish Merrill Lynch OGC Original Message From SMTP Sent Friday March AM To Cc Subject Rerevised Allegheny Side Letter for ISDA SaraJanice thanks for your comments I have reflected them in the attached draft marked to show your changes The governing law provision is a formulation that we have used at SC to accomplish the purpose of giving effect to NYGOL and should achieve the purpose of the language you added to the power master amendment I was planning to conform the latter to the language used here unless you have an objection Allegheny has not yet reviewed this draft so it remains subject to their comment I also need Yair to confirm that he is happy with the new Part Commodity Definitions section Yair this is attached as Exhibit C to the attached document Let me know if you have any further questions or comments Thanks This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately This email is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and confidential If you are not the intended recipient please delete the email and notify us immediately File Allegheny ENRON ISDA SIDE LETTERvREDDOC AESENRO Side Letter YY Commentsdoc
